name: Cyberdome Penelopenxia Alpha
description:
It's just me (Malferno) working on the game atm. I'm 25 with a bachelors in Comp Sci, a bit of prior experience with drawing and music, and a gaming addiction.

Cyberdome Penelopenxia is my first game, but I've been devving it part time (about 15 hours a week) for about a year and a half.  

I've learned a lot. I'm glad I've come this far, I hope to take the project farther still.

Tentative Future Plans: -------------------------------------------------------------

(really just a wishlist of things I'd like to add, if fate allows)

A Tutorial, Story (mostly cutscenes of some kind), More Enemies (and less placeholder models), Character Customization, Music, etc.... 

Updates to the game will be released separately from this alpha version.

(notable) Known Bugs: -----------------------------------------------------------------

>menus become hard to navigate in low resolutions
